title: Other symptoms and signs involving appearance and behaviour
chapter: Symptoms, signs and abnormal clinical and laboratory findings, not elsewhere classified
block: Symptoms and signs involving cognition, perception, emotional state and behaviour
category: Symptoms and signs involving appearance and behaviour
exclusion: abnormal findings on antenatal screening of mother
certain conditions originating in the perinatal period
those constituting part of a pattern of mental disorder
insufficient intake of food and water (due to self neglect)
